## Logistic Functions

```{r}
log_lik <- function(x, y, beta_0, beta){
  
  u <- beta0 + beta*x
  
  expu <- exp(u)
  
  loglik <- sum(y*u - log(1 + expu))
  
  p <- expu/(1 + expu)
  
  grad <- c(sum(y - p), sum(x * (y - p)))
  
  x_with_1 <- c(1, x)
  
  hess <- -sum(t(x_with_1) %*% 
                 x_with_1 * p * (1 - p))
  
  return(list(
    loglik = loglik,
    grad = grad,
    hess = hess
  ))
}
